leaders.name: Wilbert Joseph Maliackal
leaders.description: Our CEO, WILBERT,his curiosity of how sun light could be used to harness energy and the importance of green energy in present day scenerio lead to the idea of sharing the knowledge of this revolutionary technology with society which can benefit in wide varieties of fields such as production of green energy as a way to reduce global warming and to pull out of the ecological crisis that we are facing.
